name: Psychic Dust
description:
"-Relax with a powder box. Draw or create anything you want with nearly 30 kinds of materials including water, fire, oil, and even man and woman…
-In Granule Mode, you can collocate granules as you want. In Human Origin, you can experience the process of how human originates.
-Explore magical image brought by specific particles and any possible interactions between different elements. See what you can create."
